SummaryEnglish: Narihira Takeru is a delinquent who often thinks about Tsukimiya, the girl who appears in his dreams. After an unexpected accident, Takeru finds himself in a parallel universe, and the world that Tsukimiya lives in. When Takeru and Tsukimiya are slain by a monster, he awakens again and realizes he has leapt through time. Now, Takeru must train with Abe Seimei to fight for Tsukimiya’s life!

1.TitleEnglish: Don't Admit Defeat Even If You're Dead! A Delinquent in Denji Heian-kyo!
1.SummaryEnglish: After an accident, teenage delinquent Takeru wakes up to find the literal girl of his dreams standing there.

2.TitleEnglish: You Can't Build Trust With Words! This Delinquent Will Be an Onmyoji
2.SummaryEnglish: Takeru wakes up in Denji Heian-kyo again, but nobody remembers him or believes his stories about fighting oni.

3.TitleEnglish: Don't Just Focus on What You Can See! Yura's Wavering Feelings
3.SummaryEnglish: When Takeru proves to be a good battle partner for Atsunaga, Yura has some difficult decisions to make.

4.TitleEnglish: Don't Get Used to Being Alone! Takeru's First Centennial Pandemonium!
4.SummaryEnglish: Seimei plans to put Takeru's explosive but unpredictable power to use in the upcoming Centennial Pandemonium.

5.TitleEnglish: Come On Down, Once-in-a-Millennium Me! The Yasha Mask That Guides Takeru
5.SummaryEnglish: After the trauma of losing a Centennial Pandemonium fight, Takeru becomes afraid to enter the black mist.

6.TitleEnglish: This Time I'll Protect You! What Appeared Beyond the Centennial Pandemonium
6.SummaryEnglish: Takeru's power reaches all new heights, but revelations await him during the next Centennial Pandemonium.

7.TitleEnglish: Say It Ain't So! The Truth About Denji Heian-kyo Is Revealed
7.SummaryEnglish: Seimei explains to Takeru the shocking truth regarding how things work in Denji Heian-kyo.

8.TitleEnglish: Don't Screw Around With People Desperately Trying to Get By! The Wailing of Seiryu Tower
8.SummaryEnglish: Takeru decides to aid Tsukimiya in thwarting Seimei's World Whittle. Their first stop, Seiryu Tower.

9.TitleEnglish: Fight Me for Real! Takeru vs. Seimei, Souls Going Mano a Mano
9.SummaryEnglish: As Takeru destroys the Towers of the Four Gods one by one, Seimei chooses to personally face him in combat.

10.TitleEnglish: Change the Future on Your Own! Seimei, Across a Thousand Years
10.SummaryEnglish: Seimei tells Takeru of the events from a thousand years ago that led him to begin the World Whittle.

11.TitleEnglish: Get Ready, Hareaki! Final Showdown in Denji Heian-kyo!!
11.SummaryEnglish: Tsukimiya makes a power play in the final Denji Heian-kyo, and Takeru must team up with Seimei to stop her.

12.TitleEnglish: Don't Give Up on the Future! I'll Seize the Possibility I've Long Desired
12.SummaryEnglish: Seimei deduces the true nature of Takeru's powers, and how they are the key for unlocking the future.
